column5: Just wondering,The Fat and Sassy Box, says Canada Pack Bedding for leeches. I know for the last few years bringing leeches into Canada was a no-no, But this leech bedding seems to say it may be OK if the leeches are not in water but in Bedding like Crawlers. Has anyone done this, I have some very tasty jumbo's that I have personally trained to entice willing walleyes, I would like to bring along. But will pass if a hassle. Thanks Spike
According to the 2003 Ontario Fishing Regulations page 9; Import of Bait "It is illegal to bring live leeches into Ontario for use as bait, unless you are the holder of a commercial bait license."
Pretty much says it all. Thanks Rich!
